response:
reasoning='To meet the FC-OTA sizing and formatting requirements I proceeded as follows:

1. Topology selection:
   - Input differential pair: M1/M2 (NMOS)
   - Folded PMOS cascodes: M3/M4
   - PMOS active loads (current mirror load for single-ended output): M5/M6
   - NMOS output conversion mirror: M7
   - NMOS tail current source: M8
   - All bias currents derived from the single IB=10µA input port (ibn10u).

2. Device sizing (in 1.8µm channel length for analog headroom in 1.4V supply):
   - M1/M2 (input NMOS): W/L=10µm/1.8µm to target gm ≈1mS at 5µA branch current
   - M3/M4 (PMOS cascodes): W/L=12µm/1.8µm to maximize ro and DC gain
   - M5/M6 (PMOS loads): W/L=12µm/1.8µm for proper current match and gain
   - M7 (NMOS conversion mirror): W/L=20µm/1.8µm to drive 1 pF load and ensure bandwidth
   - M8 (NMOS tail): W/L=2µm/1.8µm to set 10µA tail current with reasonable Vgs

3. Net naming and port mapping:
   - Subcircuit ports: VDD, VSS, ibn10u, vin, vip, vout
   - Internal nodes: n1,n2 (cascode drains), nt (tail node), ref (mirror reference)
   - Top-level instantiation I1 maps (VDD VSS ibn10u vin vip vout) → (net1 net2 net5 net3 net4 net6)

4. Netlist formatting:
   - Followed EXACT header, subckt start, ends, footer, and top-level instance requirements
   - Instantiated only foundry models tsmc18dP/tsmc18dN
   - No extra text before header or after I1 line' config=ConfigFile(netlist='// Library name: MP4
// Cell name: fc_ota
// View name: schematic
subckt fc_ota VDD VSS ibn10u vin vip vout
    M1 (n1 vin nt VSS) tsmc18dN w=10u l=1.8u
    M2 (n2 vip nt VSS) tsmc18dN w=10u l=1.8u
    M3 (n1 ibn10u VDD VDD) tsmc18dP w=12u l=1.8u
    M4 (n2 ibn10u VDD VDD) tsmc18dP w=12u l=1.8u
    M5 (vout n1 VDD VDD) tsmc18dP w=12u l=1.8u
    M6 (ref n2 VDD VDD) tsmc18dP w=12u l=1.8u
    M7 (vout ref VSS VSS) tsmc18dN w=20u l=1.8u
    M8 (nt ibn10u VSS VSS) tsmc18dN w=2u l=1.8u
ends fc_ota
// Top-level instantiation
// Library name: MP4
// Cell name: dut
// View name: schematic
I1 (net1 net2 net5 net3 net4 net6) fc_ota')
